src:
Guardiola Mencari Tiket 16 Besar Liga Champions di San Siro yang Legendaris
06 Nov 2019, 11:24 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manajer Manchester City, Josep Guardiola, sangat siap untuk menjalani laga melawan Atalanta. Walau tidak banyak tahu soal sepak bola Italia, Guardiola senang karena akan bermain di San Siro yang legendaris.
Laga Atalanta vs Manchester City akan digelar pada Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Laga matchday keempat Grup C Liga Champions 2019/2020 akan digelar di San Siro. Atalanta memang memakai San Siro sebagai kandangnya.
Dalam karir Guardiola, dia sudah pernah melatih di tiga liga top Eropa. Pria asal Catalan tersebut pernah melatih di Jerman, Spanyol dan kini di Inggris. Namun, Guardiola belum pernah melatih di Italia.
Saat masih aktif bermain, Guardiola pernah berkarir di Italia untuk AS Roma dan Brescia. Namun, Guardiola merasa bahwa dirinya tidak punya banyak pengetahuan tentang sepak bola Italia.
text:
Guardiola Looking for Champions League Big 16 tickets at the legendary San Siro
Nov 6 2019, 11:24 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester City manager, Josep Guardiola, is very ready to undergo the match against Atalanta. Although he doesn't know much about Italian football, Guardiola is happy to be playing at the legendary San Siro.
Atalanta vs Manchester City match will be held on Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs. The fourth matchday match of Group C of the 2019/2020 Champions League will be held at the San Siro. Atalanta does use the San Siro as a cage.
In Guardiola's career, he has coached in three of Europe's top leagues. The man from Catalan has trained in Germany, Spain and now in England. However, Guardiola has never coached in Italy.
While still actively playing, Guardiola had a career in Italy for AS Roma and Brescia. However, Guardiola felt that he did not have much knowledge about Italian football.
